name: This Afterlife is Mayan
description:
This Afterlife is Mayan is a local 2 player fighting game where you use your fists to claim your spot in the afterlife. Two Mayan nemeses are are pitted against each other once more, with room for only one in the afterlife.

Playable with 2 Xbox controllers.

  • Left/Right sticks to move your fists
  • Left/Right triggers to punch

Created in five days for Castle Jam 2018 (Örebro, Sweden)

Credits:

Ruud Burke - Art

Dónall O'Donoghue - Sound + Music

Vilius Drumsta - Programming

Joel Rattur - Programming

Phillip Johansson - 3D Art

Marcel Schmid - 3D Art
